mapper.sql:
a.*,
gt.id AS "genTable.id",
cu.id AS "createBy.id", cu.username AS "createBy.username", uu.id AS "updateBy.id", uu.username AS "updateBy.username"

LEFT JOIN gen_table gt on gt.id = a.gen_table_id
LEFT JOIN sys_user cu on cu.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user uu on uu.id = a.create_by
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gen_table_column(
id, gen_table_id, name, comments, jdbc_type, java_type, java_field, is_pk, is_null, is_insert, is_edit, is_list, is_query, query_type, show_type, dict_type, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag
)
SELECT #{item.id}, #{item.genTable.id}, #{item.name}, #{item.comments}, #{item.jdbcType}, #{item.javaType}, #{item.javaField}, #{item.isPk}, #{item.isNull}, #{item.isInsert}, #{item.isEdit}, #{item.isList}, #{item.isQuery}, #{item.queryType}, #{item.showType}, #{item.dictType}, #{item.sort}, #{item.createBy.id}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updateBy.id}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.delFlag} FROM dual
